com.jakubpetriska.gameengine.api.external

Interface ExternalMessenger


  • public interface ExternalMessenger
    Allows sending messages into the engine and receiving messages coming from the engine. Instance of this class is passed outside of the engine to allow this functionality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver<T>
      Allows receiving of incoming messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void registerMessageReceiver(java.lang.Class<T> messageClass, ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver<T> messageReceiver)
      Registers ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver for receiving incoming messages.
      void sendMessage(java.lang.Object message)
      Sends message into the engine.
      <T> void unregisterMessageReceiver(java.lang.Class<T> messageClass, ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver<T> messageReceiver)
      Unregisters ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver from receiving incoming messages.

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.Object message)
        Sends message into the engine.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to send.

      • registerMessageReceiver

        <T> void registerMessageReceiver(java.lang.Class<T> messageClass,
                                 ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver<T> messageReceiver)
        Registers ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver for receiving incoming messages. Receiver will receive only messages of class T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of messages this receiver receives.
        Parameters:
        messageReceiver - Receiver to register.
        messageClass - Class object of the messages.

      • unregisterMessageReceiver

        <T> void unregisterMessageReceiver(java.lang.Class<T> messageClass,
                                   ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver<T> messageReceiver)
        Unregisters ExternalMessenger.MessageReceiver from receiving incoming messages.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of messages this receiver receives.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - Class object of the messages.
        messageReceiver - Receiver to unregister.
